title: What type of images do high school students keep in their phones? - Quora

response.answer_text: Screenshots, Screenshots, screenshots.  Yes, Atleast that's what I have on my phones, I have about 1300 screenshots as compared to somewhere around 300–400 photos of myself and this is from around 2017–18. My screenshots consists of literally everything. From news articles to memes to chats which could end friendships. Occasionally pictures of notes and study related stuff do come, but I make sure I delete it asap. I'm not a very big fan of storing *Adult Content* on my phone, I feel it's stupid, as if Instagram was not enough to have adult content storing it on phone additionally is stupid, unless you are really short of data all the time.
